    Function reference

    Data download

    Functions to download data inputs from remote repositories.

    download_globalbedo()
    Download 1km albedo data
    download_hadukdaily()
    Downloads 1km gridded historic climata data for the UK
    download_ukcp18()
    Download UKCP18 climate data
    download_ukcpsst()
    Download UKCP18rcm driven sea surface temperature predictions
    get_dem()
    terra version of microclima get_dem require(elevatr)

    Data (pre)processing and summary functions

    Functions that process and handle model inputs & outputs.

    blendtemp_hadukera5()
    Blends Met Office and ERA5 data to produce hourly 1km resolution temperature data
    checkinputs()
    Check and summarise coarse resolution climate data inputs
    create_ukcpsst_data()
    Create UKCP sea surface temperature rast stack from ncdf files
    era5toclimarray()
    convert era4 ncdf4 file to format required for model
    read_climdata()
    Read climate data
    ukcp18toclimarray()
    convert UKCP18 ncdf4 files to format required for model
    write_climdata()
    Write climate data
    plot_q_layers()
    Plots chosen layers from raster stack corresponding to selected quantiles of spatial mean
    plot_timestats_r()
    Plot timeseries plots of spatial mean, min and max values by various timesteps
    plot_wind()
    Plot 'star' or 'radar' chart of wind cardinal directions
    create_parcel_list()
    Calculates climate timeseries for vector parcels
    write_parcels()
    Write parcel climate .csv files

    Spatial downscaling

    Downscaling from coarse to fine spatial resolutions.

    basindelin()
    delineate hydrological or cold-air drainage basins
    coastalexposure()
    Calculates land to sea ratio in upwind direction
    flowacc()
    Calculates accumulated flow
    lapserate()
    Calculate Lapse rates
    precipdownscale()
    Downscale precipitation accounting for elevation effects
    presdownscale()
    Downscale pressure with elevation effects
    relhumdownscale()
    Downscale relative humidity accounting for downscaled temperature
    spatialdownscale()
    Spatially downscale all climate variables
    swdownscale()
    Downscale shortwave radiation
    tempdownscale()
    Downscale temperature
    Tpsdownscale()
    Performs thin-plate spline downscaling
    winddownscale()
    Downscale wind speed accounting for elevation and terrain sheltering effects
    windelev()
    derive wind terrain adjustment coefficient

    Temporal downscaling

    For example daily to hourly downscaling.

    blendtemp_hadukera5()
    Blends Met Office and ERA5 data to produce hourly 1km resolution temperature data
    daylength()
    Calculates day length
    hourlytemp()
    Derives hourly temperature from daily data
    hum_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly relative humidity
    pres_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly atmospheric pressure
    skyem_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly downward longwave radiation
    subdailyrain()
    Estimate sub-daily rainfall from daily rainfall
    swrad_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly shortwave radiation
    wind_dailytohourly()
    Daily to hourly wind speed downscake

    Bias correction

    Create and apply models of bias comparing modelled with historical observed data.

    biascorrect()
    Applies bias correction to one climate variable
    biascorrect_apply()
    Applies bias correction model to climate variable
    correct_era5temps()
    Applies bias correction to UK era5 temperature data
    precipcorrect()
    Applies bias correction to precipitation data
    precipcorrect_apply()
    Applies bias correction model to precipitation data

    Mesoclimate processes

    Modelling of mesoclimate mechanisms.

    clearskyrad()
    Calculates clear sky radiation
    converthumidity()
    Converts between different humidity types
    daylength()
    Calculates day length
    difprop()
    Calculates the diffuse fraction from incoming shortwave radiation
    lapserate()
    Calculate Lapse rates

    Data

    Datasets included with package.

    era5input
    A list of ERA5 climate data
    era5sst
    A 0.25 degree grid resolution dataset of sea-surface temperature data
    landsea
    A 100m grid resolution landsea mask
    ukcp18lookup
    A model member lookup table for different UKCP18 collections
    ukcp18sst
    A ~0.1 degree grid resolution dataset of UKCP18 sea-surface temperature data for NW Europe
    ukcpinput
    A list of 12km resolution UKCP18 regional climate data
